panel.title: Using Economic Analysis for Splunk
panel.html:
A fundamental aspect of this application to understand is how the data is organized. The FREDÂ® Add-On for Splunk installs a kvstore list called FRED_Default_List. This list is used to store the FRED series ID's for which we want to retrieve data. The FRED Add-On has a form for managing this list, but there is also a form to search and manage this list in this application.
Just click default-->FRED Default List in the application menu, as shown below.
